heroes.card.jaeger.title: Jaeger
heroes.card.jaeger.subtitle: Gen 3 · Archer
heroes.card.jaeger.summary: Kingshot Gen 3 SSR Archer hero Jaeger can be obtained through Daily Deals, Hero Rally, Swordland Shop, and the Strongest Governor Event.
heroes.jaeger.conq.s1.desc: Deals Attack * 224% damage to enemies in range and stuns them for 2s.
heroes.jaeger.conq.s2.desc: On hit, Jaeger deals Attack * 300% damage. On miss, he restores HP equal to Attack * 50%.
heroes.jaeger.conq.s3.desc: Increases enemy damage taken by 30% for 3s.
heroes.jaeger.exp.s1.desc: Victory music inspires allies. 20% chance to boost squad damage by 40% for 3 turns.
heroes.jaeger.exp.s2.desc: Music sharpens focus. Grants 20% chance to reduce enemy squads’ Lethality by 50% for 2 turns.
heroes.jaeger.exp.s3.desc: A lively song increases squad HP by 25%.
heroes.jaeger.gear.name: Wanderwail
heroes.jaeger.gear.s1.desc: Silences the target for 5s (skills already cast are unaffected) and deals Attack * 300% damage.
heroes.card.eric.title: Eric
heroes.card.eric.subtitle: Gen 3 · Infantry
heroes.card.eric.summary: Kingshot Gen 3 Mythic Infantry hero. Obtainable from the Hall of Heroes and Swordland Shop.
heroes.eric.conq.s1.desc: Swings the Hammer of Blessing to strike the front, dealing Attack * 168% damage and reducing target’s Attack Speed by 50% for 4s.
heroes.eric.conq.s2.desc: When attacked, Eric has a 16% chance to increase Defense by 20% for 2s (stacks up to 5 times).
heroes.eric.conq.s3.desc: Deals Attack * 112% damage in a frontal cone with a 30% chance to stun for 1s.
heroes.eric.exp.s1.desc: Reduces total enemy troop Attack by 20%.
heroes.eric.exp.s2.desc: Reduces damage taken by allied troops by 20%.
heroes.eric.gear.name: Anvil of Truth
heroes.eric.gear.s1.desc: Devotion to the Warhammer of Blessing increases damage dealt by 30%.
heroes.card.petra.title: Petra
heroes.card.petra.subtitle: Gen 3 · Cavalry
heroes.card.petra.summary: Kingshot Gen 3 SSR Cavalry hero. Obtainable from the Hero Roulette and Swordland Showdown.
heroes.petra.conq.s1.desc: Throws tarot cards at the enemy, dealing Attack * 378% damage and inflicting either -20% Attack for 2s or Stun for 1.5s.
heroes.petra.conq.s2.desc: Deals variable damage based on Petra’s base Attack * 70%. Final damage is randomly between 5% and 600% of the base.
heroes.petra.conq.s3.desc: Heals the allied hero with the lowest HP percentage. Based on Petra’s base Attack * 140%, final heal is randomly between 5% and 400% of the base.
heroes.petra.exp.s1.desc: 50% chance for allied attacks to curse enemies, increasing damage they take by 50%.
heroes.petra.exp.s2.desc: 50% chance for allied attacks to increase allied troop Attack by 50%.
heroes.petra.exp.s3.desc: Grants 40% chance to reduce damage allies take by 50%.
heroes.petra.gear.name: Fate’s Writ
heroes.petra.gear.s1.desc: Raises the min/max limits of variable skills up to 150%.
heroes.card.hilde.title: Hilde
heroes.card.hilde.subtitle: Gen 2 · Cavalry
heroes.card.hilde.summary: Kingshot Gen 2 SSR Cavalry hero. Obtainable from Daily Deals, the Strongest Governor Event, Hero Rally, and (after Gen 3) the Hall of Heroes.
heroes.hilde.conq.s1.desc: Instantly heals all allied heroes for Attack * 280%.
heroes.hilde.conq.s2.desc: Instantly heals the weakest allied hero for Attack * 140%.
heroes.hilde.conq.s3.desc: Suppresses the target for 1s and deals Attack * 196% damage.
heroes.hilde.exp.s2.desc: Allied attacks have a 25% chance to deal 200% bonus damage.
heroes.hilde.exp.s3.desc: Grants a 40% chance for allies to take 50% less damage.
heroes.hilde.gear.name: Revelation
heroes.card.zoe.title: Zoe
heroes.card.zoe.subtitle: Gen 2 · Infantry
heroes.card.zoe.summary: Kingshot Gen 2 SSR Infantry hero. Obtainable from the Hero Roulette (after Gen 3 also from Daily Deals and the Hall of Heroes).
heroes.zoe.conq.s1.desc: Deals Attack * 84% damage every 0.5s, increasing target’s damage taken by 30% for 2s.
heroes.zoe.conq.s2.desc: When HP < 50%, instantly recovers 40% of max HP (once per battle).
heroes.zoe.conq.s3.desc: Increases allied heroes’ Attack Speed by 7%.
heroes.zoe.exp.s1.desc: Allied attacks have a 20% chance to deal 40% DoT for 3 turns.
heroes.zoe.exp.s3.desc: Allied attacks have a 50% chance to increase enemy damage taken by 50%.
heroes.zoe.gear.name: The Unrighteous
heroes.zoe.gear.s1.desc: After triggering ‘Agony Rush’, increases Attack by 24% until battle ends.
heroes.card.marlin.title: Marlin
heroes.card.marlin.subtitle: Gen 2 · Archer
heroes.card.marlin.summary: Kingshot Gen 2 SSR Archer hero. Obtainable from the Hall of Heroes (higher generations also from Daily Deals).
heroes.marlin.conq.s1.desc: Deals 280% AoE damage and roots enemies for 1.5s.
heroes.marlin.conq.s3.desc: Every 5 attacks, stuns enemies for 0.5s (number of hits/stun time varies by level).
heroes.marlin.exp.s1.desc: Grants 40% chance for allies’ damage to increase by 50%.
heroes.marlin.exp.s2.desc: On attack, 20% chance to reduce total enemy troop Might by 50% for 2 turns.
heroes.marlin.exp.s3.desc: Allied attacks have a 50% chance to gain +50% damage.
heroes.marlin.gear.name: Mistweaver
heroes.marlin.gear.s1.desc: Each normal attack heals the weakest hero for Attack * 15%.
heroes.card.jabel.title: Jabel
heroes.card.jabel.subtitle: Gen 1 · Cavalry
heroes.card.jabel.summary: Kingshot Gen 1 SSR Cavalry hero. Easily obtainable through 7-Day Login Reward, Hero Recruitment, and other paths, making it one of the most accessible Mythic heroes.
heroes.jabel.conq.s1.desc: Throws a spear that pierces defense, dealing Attack * 252% damage to enemies in range and rooting them for 1.5s.
heroes.jabel.conq.s2.desc: Deals Attack * 210% damage to the target.
heroes.jabel.conq.s3.desc: When HP < 50%, increases Attack Speed by 60%.
heroes.jabel.exp.s1.desc: Grants a 40% chance for allies to take 50% less damage.
heroes.jabel.exp.s2.desc: Allied attacks have a 50% chance to deal 50% bonus damage.
heroes.jabel.gear.name: Greaves of Faith
heroes.card.amadeus.title: Amadeus
heroes.card.amadeus.subtitle: Gen 1 · Mythic · Infantry
heroes.card.amadeus.summary: Kingshot Gen 1 Infantry hero. During Gen 1, obtainable from the Governor’s Hall and VIP Packages. After Gen 1, only available via VIP Packages.
heroes.amadeus.talent.desc: While absent, increases Might and HP of all deployed troops by 15%.
heroes.amadeus.conq.s1.desc: Launches enemies in the target area and delivers a powerful 3-hit combo, each strike dealing Attack * 224% damage.
heroes.amadeus.conq.s2.desc: Each slash deals Attack * 23% Arcane Explosion damage to enemies in front.
heroes.amadeus.exp.s3.desc: Grants a 40% chance for allies’ damage to increase by 50%.
heroes.amadeus.gear.name: Aegis of Fate
heroes.card.helga.title: Helga
heroes.card.helga.subtitle: Gen 1 · Infantry
heroes.card.helga.summary: Kingshot Gen 1 Mythic Infantry hero. Unlocked via First Purchase reward and obtainable from VIP Packages.
heroes.helga.talent.desc: While absent, increases Attack and Defense of deployed troops by 10%.
heroes.helga.conq.s1.desc: Charges with antlers, dealing Attack * 224% AoE damage, knocking back enemies and stunning for 1s.
heroes.helga.conq.s2.desc: Deals Attack * 210% damage to the target.
heroes.helga.conq.s3.desc: When hit, 10% chance to increase Attack by 12% for 3s (stacks up to 5 times).
heroes.helga.exp.s1.desc: Grants a 40% chance for allies to take 50% less damage.
heroes.helga.gear.name: Bands of Tyre
heroes.card.saul.title: Saul
heroes.card.saul.subtitle: Gen 1 · Archer
heroes.card.saul.summary: Kingshot Gen 1 Mythic Archer hero. Obtainable from Daily Deals, Hero Roulette, Hall of Heroes, and Swordland Shop.
heroes.saul.conq.s1.desc: Strikes multiple times, each dealing Attack * 75% damage, and stuns the target for 2s.
heroes.saul.exp.s2.desc: Increases Building Speed by 15% and reduces Building Cost by 15%.
heroes.saul.exp.s2.up: Building Speed Up: 3% / 6% / 9% / 12% / 15% | Building Cost Down: 3% / 6% / 9% / 12% / 15%
heroes.saul.gear.name: Rabbitgear Cannon
heroes.card.amane.title: Amane
heroes.card.amane.subtitle: SR · Archer
heroes.card.amane.summary: Amane (formerly Mikoto) is an SR Archer hero added in the 2025-06-26 update. Obtainable from Hero Recruitment and the Oasis & Beyond event.
heroes.amane.conq.s1.desc: Increases Attack of all heroes and escorts by 3.5% and Attack Speed by 4.5% for 4s.
heroes.amane.conq.s3.desc: Every 3 normal attacks, Amane’s Attack Speed increases by 5% (until battle ends).
heroes.amane.exp.s2.desc: Increases Field Hospital healing speed by 50%.
heroes.card.yeonwoo.title: Yeonwoo
heroes.card.yeonwoo.subtitle: SR · Archer
heroes.card.yeonwoo.summary: SR Archer hero added in the 2025-06-26 update. Obtainable from Hero Recruitment and Oasis & Beyond event. Useful for Bear Hunt and boosts Research Speed in Expedition skills.
heroes.yeonwoo.conq.s1.desc: Triple Shot: 1st hit Attack * 100%, 2nd hit * 175%, 3rd hit * 210% (AoE).
heroes.yeonwoo.conq.s2.desc: Deals Attack * 140% damage and reduces target’s Attack Speed by 50% for 2s.
heroes.card.fahd.title: Fahd
heroes.card.fahd.subtitle: SR · Cavalry
heroes.card.fahd.summary: SR Cavalry hero added in the 2025-06-26 update. Obtainable from Hero Recruitment and Oasis & Beyond event.
heroes.fahd.conq.s1.desc: Reduces enemy troops’ Attack by 5% for 2s.
heroes.fahd.conq.s2.desc: After ‘Sandstorm’, increases Attack of self and nearby allies by 35% for 2s.
heroes.fahd.exp.s1.desc: Reduces damage dealt by all enemy troops by 20%.
heroes.fahd.exp.s2.desc: Doubles Solo Hunt March Speed (100% increase).
heroes.card.chenko.title: Chenko
heroes.card.chenko.subtitle: SR · Cavalry
heroes.card.chenko.summary: SR Cavalry hero. Obtainable from Growth Path Event, Hero Recruitment, and Watchtower missions (40 fragments required). Highly valued for Bear Hunt ‘Stand of Arms’.
heroes.chenko.conq.s1.desc: Fires rapidly at the front for 2s, every 0.5s dealing Attack * 75% AoE damage.
heroes.card.gordon.title: Gordon
heroes.card.gordon.subtitle: SR · Cavalry
heroes.card.gordon.summary: SR Cavalry hero. Obtainable from Hero Recruitment, Watchtower Missions, and Alliance Championship Shop. Suitable for Garrison with Expedition HP buffs.
heroes.gordon.conq.s1.desc: Heals all troops for Attack * 280% HP and increases Attack +7% for 4s.
heroes.card.diana.title: Diana
heroes.card.diana.subtitle: SR · Archer
heroes.card.diana.summary: SR Archer hero exclusive to Desert Trial (Event). Reduces Rally/March Stamina cost and increases March Speed up to +100% via Expedition skill (applies only when joining).
heroes.diana.conq.s1.desc: Deals Attack * 290% damage to target and Attack * 98% AoE damage to nearby enemies.
heroes.card.howard.title: Howard
heroes.card.howard.subtitle: SR · Infantry
heroes.card.howard.summary: SR Infantry hero. Obtainable from Hero Recruitment, Conquest battles, and Watchtower Missions. Provides AoE control and defense buffs in Conquest, and damage reduction + debuffs in Expedition.
heroes.howard.conq.s1.desc: Shield bash knocks back enemies and deals Attack * 280% AoE damage.
heroes.howard.conq.s2.desc: Increases Defense of all heroes by 15%.
heroes.howard.exp.s2.desc: Reduces total enemy troop Attack by 20%.
heroes.card.quinn.title: Quinn
heroes.card.quinn.subtitle: SR · Archer
heroes.card.quinn.summary: SR Archer hero unlocked in the Tutorial. Additional fragments obtainable via Hero Recruitment and Watchtower Missions. Provides single-target burst and Attack Speed in Conquest, and consistent mitigation/firepower in Expedition.
heroes.quinn.conq.s1.desc: Upgraded crossbow attack deals Attack * 560% damage.
heroes.quinn.exp.s2.desc: Allied attacks have a 50% chance to deal 50% bonus damage.
heroes.card.olive.title: Olive
heroes.card.olive.subtitle: R · Archer
heroes.card.olive.summary: Growth-type R-grade Archer hero: Increases City Mill (bread) production and outdoor bread gathering speed.
heroes.olive.conq.s1.desc: Deals Attack * 252% AoE damage around the target.
heroes.olive.conq.s2.desc: Increases damage dealt to the target by 30%.
heroes.olive.exp.s2.desc: Increases outdoor bread gathering speed by 25%.
heroes.card.edwin.title: Edwin
heroes.card.edwin.subtitle: R · Cavalry
heroes.card.edwin.summary: Growth-type R-grade Cavalry hero: Increases City Stone production and outdoor stone gathering speed.
heroes.edwin.conq.s1.desc: Throws homemade bombs, dealing Attack * 196% AoE damage to the target and surrounding enemies.
heroes.edwin.conq.s2.desc: 20% chance for explosives to cause up to 1.5s stun.
heroes.edwin.exp.s2.desc: Increases outdoor stone gathering speed by 25%.
heroes.card.seth.title: Seth
heroes.card.seth.subtitle: R · Infantry
heroes.card.seth.summary: Growth-type R-grade Infantry hero: Increases City Iron production and outdoor iron gathering speed.
heroes.seth.conq.s1.desc: Swings a mighty axe, dealing Attack * 280% damage.
heroes.seth.exp.s1.desc: Increases City Iron Mine production by 25%.
heroes.seth.exp.s2.desc: Increases outdoor iron gathering speed by 25%.
heroes.card.forrest.title: Forrest
heroes.card.forrest.subtitle: R · Infantry
heroes.card.forrest.summary: Growth-type R-grade Infantry hero: Increases City Lumber Mill production and outdoor wood gathering speed.
heroes.forrest.conq.s1.desc: For 3s, every 0.5s deals Attack * 110% damage to nearby enemies.
heroes.forrest.exp.s1.desc: Increases City Lumber Mill production by 25%.
heroes.forrest.exp.s2.desc: Increases outdoor wood gathering speed by 25%.
heroes.card.alcar.title: Alcar
heroes.card.alcar.subtitle: Generation 4 · Infantry
heroes.card.alcar.summary: A Mythic-grade Generation 4 Infantry hero in Kingshot. Obtainable via Hero Rally, Daily Deals, Strongest Governor Event, Kingdom of Power Event, and the Swordland Shop.
heroes.alcar.conq.s1.desc: A Praetorian’s glory is his strength. Alcar enters an invulnerable state (cannot move or cast skills, immune to control effects) and reduces Damage Taken for nearby friendly squads for 2s.
heroes.alcar.conq.s2.desc: Alcar spears a line of enemies, dealing Attack × 98% damage and increasing their Damage Taken by 20% for 2s.
heroes.alcar.conq.s3.desc: Alcar’s conviction fuels him. During “Glorious Mark,” restore Health equal to Attack × 42% per second for 5s.
heroes.alcar.exp.s1.desc: Reduces Infantry and Archer Damage Taken by 70% every 5 turns for 2 turns.
heroes.alcar.exp.s2.desc: Increases Infantry Damage Dealt by 100%, and Cavalry and Archer Damage Dealt by 10%.
heroes.alcar.exp.s2.up: Infantry Damage Up: +20% / +40% / +60% / +80% / +100% · Cavalry & Archer Damage Up: +2% / +4% / +6% / +8% / +10%
heroes.alcar.exp.s3.desc: Increases Infantry Damage Dealt per attack by 60% and the target’s Damage Taken by 25% for 1 turn.
heroes.alcar.gear.name: Praetorian Guard
heroes.alcar.gear.s1.desc: Glory is best shared. 'Glorious Mark' increases friendly Squads’ Attack by 42% for 2.5s.
heroes.alcar.gear.s2.desc: There is power in the steadfast vow. Alcar increases Defender Squads’ Health by 15%.
heroes.card.margot.title: Margot
heroes.card.margot.subtitle: Generation 4 · Cavalry
heroes.card.margot.summary: A Mythic-grade Generation 4 Cavalry hero in Kingshot. Obtainable via Hall of Heroes and the Swordland Showdown Shop.
heroes.margot.conq.s1.desc: Ambush: Margot ambushes an enemy with bombs, dealing Attack × 420% Area of Effect damage.
heroes.margot.conq.s2.desc: Parry: Margot has a 25% chance of parrying, avoiding all damage from enemy attacks.
heroes.margot.conq.s3.desc: Stiletto: Margot head-gouges the enemy (heroes first), dealing Attack × 140% damage and immobilizing them for 1.5s.
heroes.margot.exp.s1.desc: Warbringer: Margot’s focus on armor-penetration increases total Squads’ Attack by 25%.
heroes.margot.exp.s2.desc: Subterfuge: Margot’s positioning grants all Squads a 20% chance of dodging Normal Attacks.
heroes.margot.exp.s3.desc: Sleight Hand: Margot’s Cavalry have a 25% chance of performing an extra attack, dealing 200% damage.
heroes.margot.gear.name: Revel Fang
heroes.margot.gear.s1.desc: Indefensible: “You can’t duck both blades.” Margot has a 40% chance of launching a second attack with each Normal Attack, dealing Attack × 45% damage.
heroes.margot.gear.s2.desc: Pugilist: Margot never lets her guard down on the battlements, increasing Defender Squads’ Lethality by 15%.
heroes.card.rosa.title: Rosa
heroes.card.rosa.subtitle: Generation 4 · Archer
heroes.card.rosa.summary: A Mythic-grade Generation 4 Archer hero in Kingshot. Obtainable via Hero Roulette and the Swordland Showdown Shop.
heroes.rosa.conq.s1.desc: Battle Focus: Rosa clears all debuffs (control effects, etc.) for all squads and increases their Attack by 7% for 5s, during which they remain immune to debuffs.
heroes.rosa.conq.s2.desc: Flutterfang: Rosa spins her fan blade out with dazzling ferocity, dealing Attack × 300% damage to enemies in its path.
heroes.rosa.conq.s3.desc: Swoon Chakra: Rosa’s dancing distracts the enemy, reducing Attack Speed by 3% and healing effects by 60% for all enemy squads.
heroes.rosa.conq.s3.up: Enemy Attack Speed Down: 1% / 1.5% / 2% / 2.5% / 3% · Reduces Enemy Healing: 40% / 45% / 50% / 55% / 60%
heroes.rosa.exp.s1.desc: Chaos Gambit: Rosa grants a 40% chance of increasing all Squads’ Damage Dealt by 50%.
heroes.rosa.exp.s2.desc: Rose of War: Reduces damage dealt by 20% for all enemy squads.
heroes.rosa.exp.s3.desc: Golden Rhythm: Increases Archers’ total Attack by 30%.
heroes.rosa.gear.s1.desc: Conquest Option: Upon casting Battle Focus, Attack increases by 15% until the end of the battle.
heroes.rosa.gear.s2.desc: Expedition Option: Increases Rally Squads’ Lethality by 15%.
title: Hero Detail
noscript: Enable JavaScript to view hero details.
